articles.description: The latest shareholding pattern shows that GQG's ownership rose 202 basis points (bps) from 2.51% in December to 4.53% in the March quarter. In the case of Adani Power, the FII's stake rose from 1.33% to 5.2% sequentially.
articles.content: US-based FII GQG Partners was net buyers in 6 stocks of Adani Group and is believed to have spent around $1 billion on the conglomerate in March.The latest shareholding pattern shows that GQG's owner… [+2300 chars]
